long_description: Shimano XT SM-BB70 external bearing bottom bracket is ready for demanding use on trails and provides a stiff, smooth-spinning platform for your Hollotech II cranks. Comes with left and right bearing cups, inner sleeve and three 2.5mm spacers. Please note: compatible with English threaded bottom brackets with either 68mm or 73mm wide shells.
short_description: Shimano XT SM-BB70 external bearing bottom bracket is ready for demanding use on trails and provides a stiff, smooth-spinning platform for your Hollotech II cranks.
